TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted but he (probably) will keep making lawyer posts.

I wish for a computer with a petabyte of RAM.

Granted. NASA takes it, putting it on the ISS.

I wish hsiw I

Granted. Hi swish wi.

I wish for a permanent, real, licensed, non-injured, immortal, reusable, living, human, cheap lawyer, who is good at law, speaks the same language as me, likes me (and will continue to), will win cases in civil law when I ask him to, gets me money back, makes me look good, and will remain my lawyer in perpetuity.

Yes, I will continue making lawyer posts until it cannot be corrupted.

Granted. I can't think of a way to corrupt that.

I wish for pizza.

Granted. He lives on Mars. His name is Mark Watney. And there is no Hermes to save him.

I wish I had a pet monster.

Granted. It drops.

I wish for water.

Granted but it's a type you don't like.

EDIT IGNORE THAT

Granted but it's filled with bacteria.

I wish for a recovery spaceship to get a computer back from the ISS.

Granted. Have fun keeping your cup of water away from California.

I wish I could teleport.

Granted, but the chutes for the pod containing the computer from the ISS fail to properly deploy. You now own scrap metal.

I agree with a previous post. I would like a pizza...

Granted. It falls on the floor.

I wish for clean water.
Granted but the tank it came in breaks, so you lose it.

Granted, but you didn't wish for anything, so you don't get it.

I wish for clean water in a sturdy tank.

Granted. The water is in the sturdy tank. The water's source is the parking lot run-off of your local Wal-Mart.

I wish for a deep dish chicago style pizza...

Granted. It falls in a deeper hole.

So long as it's clean!

I wish for clean water in a sturdy tank.

what's the wish for clean water?

Granted. A bottle of perrier - with grapefruit juice magically appears on your desk...

I wish the grading would stop... the papers...they keep coming in...

Granted but instead the papers come out so paper just keeps coming out of you.

I wish I had unlimited ham and cheese crepes.

Granted. People get tired of you yelling "HAM IT UP!" and kill you.

I wish that everyone had access to clean water.

Granted, but it's everyone but you.

I wish I had unlimited rhubarb pies.

granted, they are all poisoned

i wish dman stuff was all taken by the lawyer he wished, but instead, he is evil, hates dman and will kill him

Granted. However, you cannot contradict a previous wish. My lawyer still likes me, and gives me my stuff back.

I wish that everyone (myself included) has free access to clean drinking water.

granted, but now theres no food, no seeds, nothing, the planet is a ball of clean water, theres no air to breath

i wish the moon exploded

Granted but a chunk of moon rock hits earth and causes a dinosaur sized mass extinction.

I wish I could shapeshift.

Graanted, but you can only shapeshift into invertebraes with no access to your original form.

I wish that everybody, including me, stopped forgetting to add their own wishes.
Granted. See what I did there?
Granted but the curse has broken. I wish for a Bigboy, Mause, Yamato, Saturn V combined.

Granted. All combined in a big piece of debris.

I wish a time machine.
